channel.title: What should i get?
channel.description: i have $75 left, and im considering a domain for my already existing forum for $25, and i have $50 to spend on a vps, I need some help on the vps part, because i cant choose between: One really good VPS for $50 for one month or a alright one for 3 months. Which do you think would be smarter to do? Im thinking the 3 month one.. but whats the best place to buy a VPS?

item.title: What should i get?
item.dc:creator: @Explisionist Explisionist
item.description:
@Explisionist wrote:

godaddy.com use to do Domain names for 1-3 years for $9.99

Also, VPS: go with the 3 month one unless the spec’s for the server suck.

Read full topic

item.title: What should i get?
item.dc:creator: @lotto320 lotto320
item.description:
@lotto320 wrote:

[quote=“drubrkletern, post:3, topic:375116”][quote author=Rix_ link=topic=471080.msg3447112#msg3447112 date=1293503776]
It would be wise to list the details of the VPS you’re considering to buy. By the way, $25 for a domain is a blatant rip off.
[/quote]
its for a year, not monthly :o[/quote]
Lol’d but 25$ for a year?? normally its 3-10$ per month!!

Read full topic
